app.window.title: VRC VRPoker Stats
app.error.no_log_file: No log file found: {{.Error}} — configure in Settings.
overview.title: Overall Statistics
overview.subtitle: Track your baseline first, then drill into actionable leaks.
overview.no_hands:
No hands recorded yet.
Start playing in the VR Poker world!
overview.no_metrics: No metrics selected. Enable metrics in Settings.
overview.no_samples: Not enough reliable samples yet for trend diagnostics.
overview.low_sample_tip: Low sample insights are marked with ! and should be treated as reference.
overview.no_insight_signal: No strong leak signal is detected right now.
metric.low_sample_legend: ! indicates a low-sample metric and may be inaccurate.
metric.hands.help: Total complete hands included in current stats scope.
metric.profit.help: Total chips won minus invested chips.
metric.vpip.help: Voluntarily Put Money In Pot. Preflop participation frequency.
metric.gap.help: VPIP minus PFR. Larger gap implies more passive preflop entries.
metric.three_bet.help: 3-bet frequency when a 3-bet opportunity is present.
metric.three_bet_vs_steal.help: 3-bet frequency from blinds versus steal opens.
metric.fold_to_three_bet.help: Fold frequency when facing a 3-bet after opening.
metric.squeeze.help: Squeeze frequency after open and caller before you act.
metric.steal.help: Open-raise attempt from steal positions when folded to you.
metric.fold_to_steal.help: Fold frequency in blinds versus steal attempts.
metric.fold_bb_to_steal.help: Fold frequency from BB versus steal opens.
metric.fold_sb_to_steal.help: Fold frequency from SB versus steal opens.
metric.flop_cbet.help: Continuation bet frequency on flop as preflop aggressor.
metric.fold_to_flop_cbet.help: Fold frequency when facing flop c-bet.
metric.fold_to_turn_cbet.help: Fold frequency when facing turn c-bet.
metric.wtsd.help: Went to showdown after seeing flop.
metric.delayed_cbet.help: Delayed continuation bet frequency (check flop, bet turn).
metric.bb_per_100.help: Net big blinds won per 100 hands.
insight.vpip_pfr_gap: VPIP-PFR gap is large. You may be entering pots passively too often.
insight.fold_to_steal: Fold to Steal is high. Review blind defense ranges and 3-bet/call mixes.
insight.over_cbet: High flop c-bet but low turn follow-through. You may be over-cbetting flop then giving up.
insight.thin_calls: High WTSD with low W$SD suggests thin calls. Tighten showdown-bound bluff-catching.
insight.over_folding: Low WTSD and low WWSF can indicate over-folding on later streets.
insight.passive_entry.title: Passive preflop entries
insight.passive_entry.text: You may be entering too many pots by call. Consider shifting to a raise-first plan in open spots.
insight.preflop_exploit.title: Preflop exploit risk
insight.preflop_exploit.text: Low 3-bet frequency can let opponents open too wide against you.
insight.fold_to_3bet.title: Open is too vulnerable to 3-bets
insight.fold_to_3bet.text: You fold too often versus 3-bets after opening. Opponents may 3-bet you aggressively.
insight.overfold_blinds.title: Overfolding in blinds
insight.overfold_blinds.text: You may be folding too much versus steals, which is easy to exploit over many hands.
insight.overdefend_blinds.title: Over-defending blinds
insight.overdefend_blinds.text: You may be defending too wide out of position, leading to difficult postflop spots.
insight.missed_steal.title: Missed steal/value opportunities
insight.missed_steal.text: Late-position opens may be too tight. You could be leaving uncontested pots on the table.
insight.overfold_flop.title: Overfolding vs flop c-bets
insight.overfold_flop.text: Opponents may profit by c-betting very wide because you fold too frequently on the flop.
insight.overfold_turn.title: Overfolding vs turn barrels
insight.overfold_turn.text: You may be giving up too often on turn pressure after defending flop.
insight.auto_cbet.title: Auto c-bet tendency
insight.auto_cbet.text: High flop c-bet with low turn follow-through may indicate one-and-done aggression.
insight.overcall_sd.title: Over-calling to showdown
insight.overcall_sd.text: High WTSD with low W$SD often means too many thin calls in marginal bluff-catch spots.
insight.underreach_sd.title: Not reaching showdown enough
insight.underreach_sd.text: Low WTSD with low WWSF can indicate over-folding and missed bluff-catch opportunities.
insight.low_wwsf.title: Low postflop pot capture
insight.low_wwsf.text: You may be playing too passively postflop and failing to win enough pots after seeing the flop.
insight.overbluff_bias.title: Possible over-bluff bias
insight.overbluff_bias.text: Very high non-showdown wins with weaker showdown outcomes may become fragile versus stronger opponents.
insight.reason.vpip_high: Participation is wider than standard ranges.
insight.reason.pfr_low: Raise frequency is not keeping up with VPIP.
insight.reason.gap_high: Large VPIP-PFR gap suggests passive calls.
insight.reason.threebet_low: Too few re-raises allow wider opens.
insight.reason.threebet_vs_steal_low: Blind counter-pressure versus steals is limited.
insight.reason.fold_to_3bet_high: This fold rate is high enough to invite aggressive 3-bets.
insight.reason.fourbet_low: Low 4-bet frequency gives fewer counter options.
insight.reason.fold_bb_high: Big blind defense is below a typical defend mix.
insight.reason.fold_sb_high: Small blind folds are high versus steals.
insight.reason.fold_bb_low: Very low fold rate can over-expand OOP defense.
insight.reason.fold_sb_low: Very low fold rate can over-expand OOP defense.
insight.reason.wtsd_support: Showdown tendency helps confirm over-calling risk.
insight.reason.rfi_low: Open frequency is conservative for steal-heavy positions.
insight.reason.steal_low: Steal spots are not converted often enough.
insight.reason.fold_flop_high: Flop folds are above a defend-balanced range.
insight.reason.wwsf_low: Postflop pot capture is below typical range.
insight.reason.fold_flop_normal_turn_hig: Flop defense is acceptable but turn folds spike.
insight.reason.fold_turn_high: Turn folds are high versus typical pressure handling.
insight.reason.flop_cbet_high: Flop c-bet rate is above standard continuation ranges.
insight.reason.turn_cbet_low: Turn follow-through is low after flop aggression.
insight.reason.wwsf_support: Low capture rate supports one-and-done concern.
insight.reason.wtsd_high: Showdown frequency is high for a balanced line.
insight.reason.wsd_low: Lower showdown win rate suggests thin calls.
insight.reason.wtsd_low: Showdown frequency is low for balanced bluff-catching.
insight.reason.afq_low: Aggression frequency is on the passive side.
settings.title: Settings
settings.log_path_info:
The application monitors your VRChat log file in real-time.
Log files are typically found at:

  Linux (Steam Proton):
  ~/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/438100/pfx/
  drive_c/users/steamuser/AppData/LocalLow/VRChat/VRChat/

  Windows:
  %APPDATA%\..\LocalLow\VRChat\VRChat\

Statistics are calculated for VR Poker world sessions only.
Historical logs (from before the app was started) are also analyzed.
settings.metrics_hint: Choose which metrics are shown in Overview and Position Stats.
settings.intro: Tune data sources and metric visibility for your study workflow.
settings.info_text:
Statistics are calculated for VR Poker world sessions only.
Historical logs (from before the app was started) are also analyzed.
settings.about.title: About
settings.about.text:
Tracks your poker statistics in the VRChat VR Poker world.

Includes configurable metric visibility presets and per-metric help.
Use Settings to tailor the dashboard for your study goal.

Other features:
  • Hand Range Analysis (13x13 grid)
  • Position-based statistics
hand_history.no_hands:
No hands recorded yet.
Start playing in the VR Poker world!
hand_history.select_hand: Select a hand to see details.
hand_history.timeline.headline: {{.Seat}} - {{.Action}} ({{.Amount}})

hand_history.subtitle: Select a hand to inspect street-by-street action flow.
hand_range.no_combo_records: No records for this combo in the selected position filter.
hand_range.class_action_selected: Hand Class Action Frequency (Selected Combo, All Streets)
hand_range.click_grid: Click a cell in the 13x13 grid.
position_stats.no_metrics: No metrics selected. Enable metrics in Settings.
position_stats.title: Position Distribution
position_stats.subtitle: Compare outcomes and tendencies by seat position.
